pages.text: Cryokinesis is an ability that gives gems the power to throw ice shard projectiles at their foes.$(br)When they get emotional, there are ice spikes that shoot from the ground to deal further damage. They'll also freeze the ground beneath them.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)Sapphire$(li)Snowflake Obsidian$(li)Larimar$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have it$()$(li)Quartz$(li)Jasper$(li)Agate
